summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 82nd Street, (North Side), from 35th Avenue Northeast to the east line of Wedgwood Addition No. 2; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14587 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
